name: Ruby Stdout Test
description: Test block to verify Ruby stdout works
code:
def test_stdout
  puts 'Hello from Ruby stdout!'
  puts 'This should be visible if stdout fix works'
  'Function returned successfully'
end

def print_numbers
  puts 'Counting: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5'
  (1..5).each do |i|
    puts "Number: #{i}"
  end
  'Done counting'
end

def test_math
  x = 42
  y = 58
  result = x + y
  puts "#{x} + #{y} = #{result}"
  result
end
